00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"

00040 std::string TShapeSize2DNB2::get_name() const
00041   { return "TShapeSize2DNB2"; }
00042 
00043 TShapeSize2DNB2::~TShapeSize2DNB2() {}
00044 
00049 bool TShapeSize2DNB2::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00050                                 double& result, 
00051                                 MsqError&  )
00052 {
00053   double frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00054   double psi = sqrt( frob_sqr + 2.0*det(T) );
00055 
00056   double a = 1e-12;
00057   while (!Mesquite::divide(frob_sqr+2,2*psi,result)) {
00058     MsqMatrix<2,2> Tdelta(T);
00059     Tdelta(0,0) += a;
00060     Tdelta(1,1) += a;
00061     a *= 2.0;
00062     frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(Tdelta);
00063     psi = sqrt( frob_sqr + 2.0*det(Tdelta) );
00064     result = (frob_sqr+2) / 2*psi;
00065   }
00066 
00067   result -= 1.0;
00068   return true;
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 bool TShapeSize2DNB2::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00073                                           double& result, 
00074                                           MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00075                                           MsqError& err )
00076 {
00077   double frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00078   double psi = sqrt( frob_sqr + 2.0*det(T) );
00079 
00080   double a = 1e-12;
00081   while (!Mesquite::divide(frob_sqr+2,2*psi,result)) {
00082     MsqMatrix<2,2> Tdelta(T);
00083     Tdelta(0,0) += a;
00084     Tdelta(1,1) += a;
00085     a *= 2.0;
00086     frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(Tdelta);
00087     psi = sqrt( frob_sqr + 2.0*det(Tdelta) );
00088     result = (frob_sqr+2) / 2*psi;
00089   }
00090   
00091   //MsqMatrix<2,2> d_psi = 1.0/psi * (T + transpose_adj(T));
00092   //deriv_wrt_T = (1.0/psi) * (T - result * d_psi);
00093   const double f = result/(psi*psi);
00094   deriv_wrt_T = transpose_adj(T);
00095   deriv_wrt_T *= -f;
00096   deriv_wrt_T += (1.0/psi - f) * T;
00097   
00098   result -= 1.0;
00099   
00100   return true;
00101 }
00102 
00103 
00104 bool TShapeSize2DNB2::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00105                                           double& result, 
00106                                           MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00107                                           MsqMatrix<2,2> second[3],
00108                                           MsqError& err )
00109 {
00110   double frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00111   double psi = sqrt( frob_sqr + 2.0*det(T) );
00112 
00113   double a = 1e-12;
00114   while (!Mesquite::divide(frob_sqr+2,2*psi,result)) {
00115     MsqMatrix<2,2> Tdelta(T);
00116     Tdelta(0,0) += a;
00117     Tdelta(1,1) += a;
00118     a *= 2.0;
00119     frob_sqr = sqr_Frobenius(Tdelta);
00120     psi = sqrt( frob_sqr + 2.0*det(Tdelta) );
00121     result = (frob_sqr+2) / 2*psi;
00122   }
00123   
00124   const double inv_psi = 1.0/psi;
00125   MsqMatrix<2,2> d_psi = T + transpose_adj(T);
00126   d_psi *= inv_psi;
00127 
00128   deriv_wrt_T = d_psi;
00129   deriv_wrt_T *= -result;
00130   deriv_wrt_T += T;
00131   deriv_wrt_T *= inv_psi; 
00132   
00133   set_scaled_2nd_deriv_wrt_psi( second, -result*inv_psi, psi, T );
00134   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second,  2*result*inv_psi*inv_psi, d_psi );
00135   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second, -inv_psi*inv_psi, d_psi, T );
00136   pluseq_scaled_I( second, inv_psi );
00137   
00138   result -= 1.0;
00139   
00140   return true;
00141 }
